data.title: Slowdive Announce 2024 North American Tour
data.meta_description: Slowdive has announced their return to the US with a North American tour in Spring 2024, starting in Ventura, CA, on April 25th.
data.text:
Slowdive has announced their return to the US with a North American tour in Spring 2024. This tour follows the overwhelming success of their sold-out fall US tour and the critically acclaimed release of their latest album, Everything Is Alive.

The tour will kick off at Washington DC’s 9:30 Club on March 4th and conclude at Los Angeles’ Fonda Theatre on March 19th. Tickets for all shows will be available for sale from Friday, December 8th at 10 AM local time.

The tour, which includes stops in cities such as Atlanta, Dallas, Denver, and New Orleans, promises to bring the band’s mesmerizing soundscapes and dreamy shoegaze melodies to new audiences. This announcement comes on the heels of Everything Is Alive, their first album since the 2017 self-titled release, which received high praise from critics and fans alike.

Everything Is Alive has been hailed as a significant return for Slowdive, with Vulture describing it as “hypnotically gorgeous,” and Billboard noting its “dreamy yet taut melding of their strengths.” Brooklyn Vegan went as far as to call it “perhaps the best record of their career.”

Slowdive Spring 2024 North American Tour Dates

April 25: Ventura, CA – The Majestic Ventura Theater

April 26: Pomona, CA – The Fox Theater Pomona

April 27: Las Vegas, NV – Sick New World Festival

April 28: Phoenix, AZ – The Van Buren

April 30: Albuquerque, NM – The Historic El Rey Theater

May 1: Denver, CO – Levitt Pavilion Denver

May 3: Kansas City, MO – The Truman

May 4: St. Louis, MO – The Pageant

May 5: Indianapolis, IN – Egyptian Room at Old National Centre

May 7: Louisville, KY – Old Forester’s Paristown Hall

May 8: Pelham, TN – The Caverns

May 10: Dallas, TX – Longhorn Ballroom

May 11: Houston, TX – White Oak Music Hall

May 12: Austin, TX – ACL Live at The Moody Theater

May 14: New Orleans, LA – The Civic Theatre

May 16: Birmingham, AL – Avondale Brewing Company

May 17: Atlanta, GA – The Eastern

May 18: Asheville, NC – Rabbit Rabbit
